message.body: Cool, Nicks in and once I hear from Barone and Brian I'll buy tix
They have the buy 3 get 3 free deal I think
Yeah I'm going to do that, are you available to see either the nets or hawks game?
Got us tickets for tomm and fri the 20th, hawks game
The dude on the phone hooked it up too, gave us the best possible seats for the price point ($55 ice pack). We get to go to 2 games for 18.33 each
At perfect, we should meet up before for some happy hour beers.
Definitely. I live at 15th & Ritner and we could walk down from my house. Either drink some beers there or go to a bar around my area.
Perfect, I'll hit you up tomm late afternoon and we'll coordinate
